'The Theft Act 1968' is an Act of the Parliament of the United Kingdom. It
creates a number of offences against property in England and Wales. On 15
January 2007 the Fraud Act 2006 came into force, redefining most of the offences
of deception.
categories: Acts of the Parliament of the United Kingdom concerning England and Wales
